metadata.title: CVE-2024-44998 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:atm: idt77252: prevent use after free in dequeue_rx()We can't dereference "skb" after calling vcc->push() because the skbis released.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-44998` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-231-generic - 4.15.0-231.243~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-231-generic - 4.15.0-231.243~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-231-lowlatency - 4.15.0-231.243~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1175-aws - 4.15.0-1175.188~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1183-azure - 4.15.0-1183.198~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1168-gcp - 4.15.0-1168.185~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1137-oracle - 4.15.0-1137.148~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
